EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Risks of Out-of-Date ATM Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Are you leaving the door wide open for thieves and fraudsters? If you’re not running the latest software on your ATMs, you might be. And with updates and patches coming ever more frequently, it’s tough to keep current. But that’s exactly what criminals hope: that your ATMs are not using the latest software to keep your assets and brand protected. What’s more, out-of-date software can also impact availability, performance and your customer’s experience.
